body: @minux well, a combination of unsafe, reflection, and testing.M seemed like the best combination in the end. Please see [package benchserve](https://github.com/josharian/benchserve) ([godoc](https://godoc.org/github.com/josharian/benchserve)) for an initial implementation. Feedback most welcome. If it looks good to you, then we can turn our attention to making a good test driver, probably at a first pass a combination of [bench](https://github.com/josharian/bench) and [rod](https://github.com/josharian/rod).
